input_text:
Job Title: Fiber Network Owners Rep / Senior Project Manager – Data Center Construction

Location: Fort Wayne, IN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Engineering, Project Management

Description:
Company Description

From the inception of a project through to completion and beyond, Turner & Townsend help to deliver the outcomes that matter through transformational programs covering the full spectrum of consultancy, project delivery and post-project operations.

With offices located globally, you're never far away from our services. Working from 113 offices in 46 countries, we make the difference to projects across the real estate, infrastructure and natural resources sectors worldwide.

Our team is dynamic, innovative and client-focused, supported by an inclusive and fun company culture. Our clients value our proactive approach, depth of expertise, integrity and the quality we deliver. As a result, our people get to enjoy working on some of the most exciting projects in the world.

Job Description

Turner & Townsend are seeking a Network Owners Rep / Senior Project Manager to work with our West Coast Data Center team to support a key client’s retrofit/upgrade program. To be successful in this position you must have great communication skills and be comfortable operating in a client-facing role.

Responsibilities

Scope is to provide (campus level) liaison to network infrastructure/security-related Owner team’s and end-to-end ownership of all network project deliverables.

Owner Expectations:Communications between Owner and Networking Contractors, set and manage timelines, vendor training.Site walks:Construction progress reviews via weekly (at minimum) site walks.Construction quality reviews via weekly site walks.Perform field safety walks and Ensure EH&S compliance.Capture owners needs and expectations, gaining and maintaining stakeholder support, mitigating/channeling opposition:Structured fiber kickoff .BPR/SR review, define priority panels for both OSP and ISP fiber.Schedule review to ensure milestones on checklist are adhered to as well as ensuring structured fiber is complete according to schedules of ancillary systems that require connectivity.Scope development and RFP Issuance.Owner directed procurement- Review materials list and coordinate purchase with project teams.Understand needs for server floor cabling and manage delivery via Network contractors.
Qualifications

2-5+ years’ experience working in a Data Center Network delivery role.Business and technical knowledge of networking (Hyperscale preferred)Relevant qualifications e.g Construction Management degree, or BICSIGood knowledge of construction industry technical matters, such as different procurement routes, value management and value engineering.Valid US passport with no visa restrictions.

Additional Information

On-site presence and requirements may change depending on our client's needs.

Our inspired people share our vision and mission. We provide a great place to work, where each person has the opportunity and voice to affect change.

We want our people to succeed both in work and life. To support this we promote a healthy, productive and flexible working environment that respects work-life balance. 

Turner & Townsend is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and actively encourage applications from all sectors of the community.

Please find out more about us at www.turnerandtownsend.com/

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

Join our social media conversations for more information about Turner & Townsend and our exciting future projects:

Twitter

Instagram

LinkedIn

It is strictly against Turner & Townsend policy for candidates to pay any fee in relation to our recruitment process. No recruitment agency working with Turner & Townsend will ask candidates to pay a fee at any time. 

Any unsolicited resumes/CVs submitted through our website or to Turner & Townsend personal e-mail accounts, are considered property of Turner & Townsend and are not subject to payment of agency fees. In order to be an authorised Recruitment Agency/Search Firm for Turner & Townsend, there must be a formal written agreement in place and the agency must be invited, by the Recruitment Team, to submit candidates for review.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
